item.title: ColorChange- Why doesn't this work?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

[quote=“jason2gs, post:1, topic:45372”]It compiles, but it doesn’t do what I want it to do. Why?

[code]program New;
procedure ColorChange;
begin
clickMouse(240, 240, True);
clickMouse(240, 240, False);
end;

begin
repeat
ColorChange; //the things you want to repeat MUST be inbetween the repeat and until
//statements.
wait(10) //just added a little wait to reduce lag.
until(false)
end.[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

[code]program New;

end;

begin
repeat
until(false)
ColorChange;
end.[/code]
